nodes.text: Dex's Donuts was a donut stand that was located on the planet Coruscant.

The stand was located on a sidewalk, at the corner of Avenue Peth and Zevanth Street. It sold only donuts and freshly-brewed caf. The Besalisk Dexter Jettster operated the stand, and he was assisted by a second-hand Crisp-E-O donut droid.

Dex's Donuts was established by the chef Dexter Jettster when he first arrived on Coruscant during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The stand generated Jettster only a modest income, and was destroyed when an air taxi piloted by an inattentive driver crashed into it.
